issue.title: gyazo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://gyazo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgyazo.com%2F) ### Comment > How come gyazo is blocked? I think it’s also blocked on the windows version too. It’s just a screen capture application. It shouldn’t be blocked. Another thing many other websites are blocked yet they are on my allowed list.
